scenes.title: Homecoming
scenes.text: Dawn on your own shore. Allies will stand — or not — by what you’ve won.

choices.label: Outwit Kaelvar (keen insight ≥4)
choices.text: You read Kaelvar’s intent and turn his own plans against him.

choices.label: Outwit with Whispers aid (Wit ≥3, Whispers ally)
choices.text: With Whispers’ subtle guidance, you outmaneuver Kaelvar’s schemes.

choices.label: Persuade Kaelvar (poise ≥4)
choices.text: Your words ring with conviction, swaying even hardened hearts.

choices.label: Persuade with honor (Charm ≥3 & Honorable)
choices.text: You appeal to Kaelvar’s sense of honor, and he hesitates.

choices.label: Defy in single combat (strength ≥4)
choices.text: You meet Kaelvar’s blade with unwavering resolve.

choices.label: Defy with Iron at your back (Might ≥3 & Iron ally)
choices.text: Iron’s warriors rally to your side as you challenge Kaelvar.

choices.label: Bargain tribute (Coins ≥3 & Wit ≥3 or Charm ≥3)
choices.text: You offer tribute, and Kaelvar’s eyes gleam with calculation.

choices.label: Bargain with Ashen backing (Coins ≥3 & Charm ≥2 & Ashen ally)
choices.text: With Ashen’s support, your offer carries unexpected weight.

choices.label: If words fail, go to war
choices.text: You steel yourself for battle as diplomacy collapses.

scenes.title: The Battlefield
scenes.text: Horns blare. Outcome hangs on your allies.

choices.label: Stand with three allies (Allies ≥3)
choices.text: Your allies rally, banners high, as you charge together.

choices.label: Stand with two allies (Allies ≥2)
choices.text: Two allies stand by you, but the odds are grim.

choices.label: Stand with one ally (Allies ≥1)
choices.text: You and a lone ally brace for the onslaught.

choices.label: Stand alone (no allies)
choices.text: You face the enemy alone, hope fading with the dawn.

scenes.title: Peaceful Victory
scenes.text: Kaelvar withdraws, seeing the cost. Your village is saved. THE END.

scenes.title: Diplomatic Victory
scenes.text: Your words carry the day. Songs will remember this mercy. THE END.

scenes.title: Martial Victory
scenes.text: Steel meets steel; the serpent banner retreats. THE END.

scenes.title: Pragmatic Victory
scenes.text: Tribute buys time. An uneasy peace, but peace nonetheless. THE END.

scenes.title: Bloody Victory
scenes.text: With three allies, you prevail — at cost. THE END.

scenes.title: Pyrrhic Victory
scenes.text: You survive with two allies, but pay dearly. THE END.

scenes.title: Burned Village
scenes.text: With one ally, the village burns. Survivors scatter. THE END.

scenes.title: Utter Defeat
scenes.text: Alone against the serpent. The village falls. THE END.
